column4: volume is very low in my new ibex install - anyone have the answer?
yeah. open up the "foward" mixer in your mixer settings. turn that one up too ;)
don't see a 'foward' mixer... i'll enable everything and see what happens
it was 'surrond' for me. thanks a lot! :)
yeah it might be something else, but I found master wasn't controlling all output channels since one of the "child" channels was set lower anyway.
